job_tasks.phrase: advanced, web-based project management solution tailored for multi-project management
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core business function and target audience of the product, indicating a need to understand business needs in project management.
This highlights a key business objective that the technology aims to achieve, requiring an understanding of business processes.

job_tasks.phrase: enhances the capabilities of widely used platforms
job_tasks.justification: This indicates that the role requires understanding how the product integrates with and improves existing business tools.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a project management solution and its features. It does not mention any AI or machine learning technologies, tasks, or skills, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
